name: David Thyresson (DT)
title: Cofounder & General Partner, PWV
bio: DT is a technical founder and deeptech investor fluent in infrastructure, applied ML, and edge systems. He's built and exited multiple startups, and now helps our founders architect products that scale. He's the one founders call when they're deep in the build and need a partner who speaks their language.
hoverLine: The engineer's engineer and your secret weapon in building.
